title: BUG: End of game freezes, forced to restart computer
body: I've had this happen thrice now, after a game sometimes my game will freeze right as the nexus is about to explode and it just sits there, frozen in place. I am able to move my mouse but even if I ctrl+esc I cannot access my desktop; also tried ctrl+alt+delete and that works as long as a sign out of my username on my PC. recently talked to a friend and was told this had also happened to him. help please?

replies.body: I'd also like to add an alternative to the fixing the issues was to just restart my computer completely, I am not able to access the task manager to end league that way, due to league still being open everywhere above my task bar on my desktop.
I have same problem, although it only happens if i dc from ethernet and change to wifi, cant change back to ethernet unless restart computer.

>ctrl+esc

Why on Earth would you try that? Just Alt+Tab back to Desktop, so you can check to see what it's doing, or even better, Ctrl+Shift+Esc to open the Task Manager *and* switch focus.

But that's not so important. From now, test in custom games until you've fixed it. Does this happen every game or just randomly? Have you tried repairing your client (back up item sets first!)?

Edit: Just read your follow up post (which really you should just edit into the OP). What version of Windows are you on?
